channel.title: GitHub SystemVerilog Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of SystemVerilog in GitHub

item.title: adam-maj/tiny-gpu
item.description: A minimal GPU design in Verilog to learn how GPUs work from the ground up

item.title: lowRISC/opentitan
item.description: OpenTitan: Open source silicon root of trust

item.title: chipsalliance/caliptra-rtl
item.description: HW Design Collateral for Caliptra RoT IP

item.title: pulp-platform/axi
item.description: AXI SystemVerilog synthesizable IP modules and verification infrastructure for high-performance on-chip communication

item.title: openhwgroup/cvfpu
item.description: Parametric floating-point unit with support for standard RISC-V formats and operations as well as transprecision formats.

item.title: openhwgroup/cvw
item.description: CORE-V Wally is a configurable RISC-V Processor associated with RISC-V System-on-Chip Design textbook. Contains a 5-stage pipeline, support for A, B, C, D, F, M and Q extensions, and optional caches, BP, FPU, VM/MMU, AHB, RAMs, and peripherals.

item.title: chipsalliance/caliptra-ss
item.description: HW Design Collateral for Caliptra Subsystem, which comprises Caliptra RoT IP and additional manufacturer controls.
